Name: Amulet
Description: A small, pale-green glazed faience amulet of a lioness-headed goddess, either Sakhmet or Bastet. She is standing on an oblong base with the left foot advanced and her right arm hanging down at her side. In her left hand she holds a papyrus-shaped staff before her. On top of the goddess's head is a small sun-disk, at the back is a loop for suspension.
